home.hero_title: Literally just a database and some divs.
home.hero_subtitle: Why pay 10 bucks a month for a link page? I built this at 3 AM fueled by caffeine. You deserve to have all features for free.

features.title: It's not rocket science
features.f1_desc: Because apparently clicking arrows is too much work in 2026. Just yeet the links where you want them.
features.f2_desc: I centered a div and picked some colors so you don't have to.
features.f3_desc: Graph goes up = dopamine. Track who clicks what, I don't judge.

auth.login_title: Ah shit, here we go again
